CHARACTER LRN: 099999999999 John Doe Horse Image 1st Quarter Bird Image 2nd Quarter Rat Image 3rd Quarter Fox Image 4th Quarter Decorative Animal Back LESSON - QUARTER 1 TOPIC ACTIVITY Quarter Selection Similar and Dissimilar Fractions ======= LESSON 1 - ACTIVITIES LESSON 1 LESSON 1 - TOPIC OBJECTIVE: After this lesson, you should be able to add and subtract simple fractions and mixed numbers, whether with regrouping or without regrouping. Settings Example: Fractions are similar if they have the same bottom number (denominator) and dissimilar if they have different bottom numbers. 2/20 and 5/20 SIMILAR 2/13 and 5/14 DISSIMILAR Examine each pair of fractions and determine whether they are similar or dissimilar.
